definition: Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
variant of 瓶[ping2]
bottle/vase/pitcher/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for wine and liquids
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: If Saturn be in Aquarius, he will be a mere woman-hater.
sentences.chinese: 如果土星位于水瓶座，盘主会很讨厌女性。

sentences.english: In this regard, the prevailing star for Aquarius is Uranus.
sentences.chinese: 在这方面，现行的水瓶座守护星是天王星。

sentences.english: Aquarians are good workers and usually are paid well.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座的人是优秀的从业人员，通常享有高薪。

sentences.english: Other signs may require a lot of understanding and compromise.
sentences.chinese: 其他星座要想和水瓶座白头偕老需要很多理解和妥协。

sentences.english: So what are the traits of an Aquarius man in love?
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座的男人陷入恋爱又有什么特征呢？

sentences.english: Uranus rules Aquarius and the element of this sign is air.
sentences.chinese: 天王星主管水瓶座，而成为这个符号的元素是大气。

sentences.english: Aquarius is the sign of visionaries, unconventionality and intellectual independence.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座是有远见的迹象，异常和智力的独立性。

sentences.english: Over and above, we see the facts of lucky days under the signs of Aquarius.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，我们能够看到真实的水瓶座幸运日。

sentences.english: They often take an unusual path, thanks to their intellect and offbeat ideas.
sentences.chinese: 满腹的才华和非主流的思想常常使水瓶座不走寻常路。

sentences.english: Aquarius is an air sign, like Gemini and Libra.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座和双子座，天秤座一样都是风象形作。

sentences.english: Or maybe Aquarians are all like this?
sentences.chinese: 难道水瓶座的人都是这样吗？

sentences.english: Aquarius is very much epitomes the planet that inspires it.
sentences.chinese: 受天王星控制的水瓶座简直就是天王星的缩影。

sentences.english: You need more sleep with the Sun so far from your sign.
sentences.chinese: 太阳远离水瓶座，所以你需要更多的睡眠。

sentences.english: Both planets will be meeting in Aquarius in your eleventh house of humanitarian efforts.
sentences.chinese: 木星和海王星会位于水瓶座，在掌管你人道的十一宫。

sentences.english: You can make career moves that will bring you a much higher income.
sentences.chinese: 本月水瓶座适合换一换工作，这样会带来更高的收入。

sentences.english: Personality Aquarians have a good sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 性格水瓶座的人富有幽默感。

definition: Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
Taurus (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
constellation/astrological sign/CL:張|张[zhang1]
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Capricorn (star sign)/northern people in classical times, a branch of the Huns or Xiongnu 匈奴
balance scale/Taiwan pr. [tian1 ping2]
Scorpio (constellation)
